Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 65th overall pick, by Minnesota in 1976...
Won World Championship with Minnesota in 1979...
Earned first career win on 4/6/1980...
Had first career hit on 5/22/1981, off Justin Bostic (NE)...
Injured on 5/17/1982 with a Broken Nose, out for one week...
Injured on 7/20/1984 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 2/7/1985 to a 3-year deal worth $800,000 per year...
Won World Championship with Pittsburgh in 1986...
